entry.source: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418008}Ah... You... You're here to kill me...{F801}Is that what he ordered?{F801}{F802}I knew he would send someone...{F801}We were in love... and he just threw{F801}me away like a filthy rag.{F801}{F802}We promised each other that we would{F801}be together forever... I was ready to{F801}throw away everything for him!{F801}{F802}I won't forgive him... ever...{F801}{F802}So please...{F801}Let me keep going...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418008}Ah... You... You're here to kill me...{F801}Is that what he ordered?{F801}{F802}I knew he would send someone...{F801}We were in love... and he just threw{F801}me away like a filthy rag.{F801}{F802}We promised each other that we would{F801}be together forever... I was ready to{F801}throw away everything for him!{F801}{F802}I won't forgive him... ever...{F801}{F802}So please...{F801}Let me keep going...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418003}Oh... Thank you...{F801}{F802}...I will take everything from him...{F801}Everything... that makes him happy...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418003}Oh... Thank you...{F801}{F802}...I will take everything from him...{F801}Everything... that makes him happy...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418006}No... Noooooooo!{F801}{F802}Am I not... gah... even allowed to...{F801}curse that man...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Bai Suzhen\0{F87A,-508}{F813,1,418006}No... Noooooooo!{F801}{F802}Am I not... gah... even allowed to...{F801}curse that man...?{F801}
